LanguageData.Parapet.label: Parapeto
LanguageData.Parapet.description: Una pared de piedra a altura de la cintura construida para la defensa.
LanguageData.Parapet_Blueprint.label: parapet (blueprint)
LanguageData.Parapet_Frame.label: parapet (building)
LanguageData.Parapet_Frame.description: A waist-high stone wall built for defense.
LanguageData.chevalDeFrise.label: Caballos de Frisia
LanguageData.chevalDeFrise.description: Una barrera defensiva hecha de palos afilados. Es débil pero lento para subir.
LanguageData.chevalDeFrise_Blueprint.label: cheval de frise (blueprint)
LanguageData.chevalDeFrise_Frame.label: cheval de frise (building)
LanguageData.chevalDeFrise_Frame.description: A defensive barrier made of sharpened sticks. It is weak but slow to climb over.
LanguageData.WallEmbrasure.label: Alféizar
LanguageData.WallEmbrasure.description: Una pared de piedra de altura de la cintura construida para la defensa.
LanguageData.WallEmbrasure_Blueprint.label: embrasure (blueprint)
LanguageData.WallEmbrasure_Frame.label: embrasure (building)
LanguageData.WallEmbrasure_Frame.description: A waist-high stone wall built for defense.
LanguageData.WallWire.label: Alambre de espino
LanguageData.WallWire.description: Las buenas vallas hacen para el buen vecino. Esta cerca se hace con alambre cortante para mantener a la mayoría alejada.
LanguageData.WallWire_Blueprint.label: barbed wire (blueprint)
LanguageData.WallWire_Frame.label: barbed wire (building)
LanguageData.WallWire_Frame.description: Good fences make for good neighbor. This fencing is made out of razor wire to keep most people away.
LanguageData.Moat.label: Foso poco profundo
LanguageData.Moat.description: Una defensa de perímetro ligero para frenar a tu enemigo.
LanguageData.Moat_Blueprint.label: shallow moat (blueprint)
LanguageData.Moat_Frame.label: shallow moat (building)
LanguageData.Moat_Frame.description: A light perimeter defense to slow down your enemy.
LanguageData.Razor_Wire_Trap.label: Trampa de alambre cortante
LanguageData.Razor_Wire_Trap_Blueprint.label: razor wire trap (blueprint)
LanguageData.Razor_Wire_Trap_Frame.label: razor wire trap (building)
LanguageData.Building_Pawn_Upgrader.label: Estación Escudo Nanite
LanguageData.Building_Pawn_Upgrader.description: Suministra y recarga los moduladores de escudo Nanite de los colonos para protegerlos de lesiones.
LanguageData.Building_Pawn_Upgrader_Blueprint.label: nanite shield station (blueprint)
LanguageData.Building_Pawn_Upgrader_Frame.label: nanite shield station (building)
LanguageData.Building_Pawn_Upgrader_Frame.description: Supplies and recharges Nanite Shield Modulators on colonists to protect them from injury.
